trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_SEQ_00<tab>Moxia wears a self-satisfied grin on her face.

TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_SEQ_01<tab>The ever-enterprising Moxia has devised what she believes to be the key to a nonviolent resolution with her touched kin. Take the so-called “fuddle-bombs” to the Hanging Barbs and souse the touched sylphs into forgetting any hurtful schemes they might be plotting.

TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_SEQ_02<tab>The touched sylphs emerged from the clouds of milkroot in a considerably more amiable mood than before. Return to Moxia and inform her that her invention has lived entirely up to expectations.

TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_SEQ_03<tab>Moxia is exceedingly pleased─both with herself for the ingenuity of her invention and with you for assisting in the deed. Once again, you have proven yourself a true friend to the sylphs of Little Solace.
TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_TODO_00<tab>Use the bibulous bombs at the designated locations in the Hanging Barbs.
TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_MOXIA_000_000<tab>Nasty ones hang about Hanging Barbs, skulking and sneaking. This one is not sure what nasty ones are plotting, but this one is sure it is nothing good.

TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_MOXIA_000_002<tab>This one wants to stop nasty ones' nastiness, but this one would rather not hurt nasty ones─after all, nasty ones were like these ones not so long ago. What is this one to do?

TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_MOXIA_000_003<tab>That was when this one was struck with the idea of this one's lifetime. Can walking one guess what this one did? No? This one made fuddle-bomb from shiny scales and milky milkroot!

TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_MOXIA_001_003<tab>It explodes into a cloud so milky that nasty ones will become tipsy ones and forget all about doing nastiness. This one knows─fuddle-bomb exploded in this one's face once, and this one completely forgot what this one was making. Tee hee!
TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_MOXIA_000_004<tab>Walking one must travel to Hanging Barbs and fling fuddle-bombs at nasty ones' homes, so nasty ones will be nasty no more!
TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_MOXIA_000_010<tab>Brave one must travel to Hanging Barbs and fling fuddle-bombs at nasty ones' homes, so nasty ones will be nasty no more!
TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_SYLPHENEMY_001_030<tab>Where is this one? What was this one doing? Does this one even care? This one thinks not─tee hee!
TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_SYLPHENEMY_001_031<tab>This one is in the mood for dancing! And prancing! What one wants to dance with this one?
TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_SYLPHENEMY_001_032<tab>Tee hee! Tee hee hee! Tee hee hee hee hee hee hee─hic!─hee.
TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_SYLPHENEMY_001_033<tab>This one is feeling sleepy. This one is going to go home and take a nap.
TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_MOXIA_000_020<tab>Nasty ones are now happy ones, dancing ones, and sleepy ones? Brave one has done well! This one could not be more pleased.
TEXT_BANSYL309_01285_MOXIA_000_021<tab>This one's fuddle-bombs may yet make peace between these ones and those ones. But these ones cannot do this alone. These ones count on brave one for one's help!
